contexts.context: ...also say, "do not harm one another." It is <mark>forbidden</mark> to attack another person of the Imperial cult, and of...
...another person of the Imperial cult, and of course, <mark>forbidden</mark> to kill another member. It is forbidden to steal from...
...of course, forbidden to kill another member. It is <mark>forbidden</mark> to steal from another member, whether by open theft or...
...whether by open theft or by covert pickpocketing. It is <mark>forbidden</mark> to trespass upon the private property of another member. Break...
...Codes of Mephala and the prophecies of Veloth and even the <mark>forbidden</mark> teachings of Trinimac.
Though <mark>forbidden</mark> to some, not to you.
